TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Cookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來管理 Cookie 的一組屬性和方法。

span.span: Provides a set of properties and methods that are used to manage cookies.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別供用戶端應用程式來擷取收到的 HTTP 回應的 cookie 的相關資訊。The class is used by a client application to retrieve information about cookies that are received with HTTP responses. 剖析 HTTP 回應標頭時支援下列的 cookie 格式： 原始的 Netscape 規格、 RFC 2109 和 RFC 2965。The following cookie formats are supported during parsing of the HTTP response headers: the original Netscape specification, RFC 2109, and RFC 2965. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱各種建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the various constructors. ## Examples 下列範例會將要求傳送至的 URL，並顯示回應中傳回的 cookie。The following example sends a request to a URL and displays the cookies returned in the response. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 一般而言，應用程式並不需要建構 類別，因為它會自動依據由 HTTP 回應接收的 Set-Cookie 標頭建立。

span.span: In general, an application does not need to construct a class because it is created automatically based on the Set-Cookie header received with the HTTP response.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會初始化所有欄位，為其預設值，使用空字串 ("") 的`name`， `value`， `path`，和`domain`。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values, using empty strings ("") for `name`, `value`, `path`, and `domain`. 請注意，至少屬性必須初始化之前使用的執行個體類別。Note that at least the property must be initialized before using an instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定伺服器可加入至 的註解。

span.span: Gets or sets a comment that the server can add to a .

value.span: 這個 使用說明文件的選擇性註解。

span.span: An optional comment to document intended usage for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端可以檢查這個選擇性的註解，如伺服器所新增的資訊。The client can inspect this optional comment for information added by the server. 例如，伺服器可能包括隱私權原則或預期用法等問題的相關資訊。For example, the server could include information about issues like the privacy policy or intended usage. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. span.span: if the client is to discard the at the end of the current session; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`true`，此屬性會指示用戶端應用程式不儲存工作階段結束時，使用者的硬碟磁碟上。When `true`, this property instructs the client application not to save the on the user's hard disk when a session ends. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器不能指定自己的 URI 以外的網域。A server cannot indicate a domain other than its own URI. 不過，它可以表示網域中的多部伺服器。However, it can indicate more than one server in the domain. 預設值是此 cookie 已收到來自主機。The default value is the host that this cookie has been received from. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能用做為索引鍵雜湊表中的類別必須提供此覆寫，，因為會作為雜湊表中的索引鍵的物件，才能透過這個方法產生自己的雜湊程式碼。Classes that might be used as a key in a hash table must provide this override, because objects that are used as keys in a hash table are required to generate their own hash code through this method.

summary.span: 取得或設定 要套用的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URIs to which the applies.
The URIs to which the applies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定此原始伺服器上的 Uri 子集套用。The property specifies the subset of URIs on the origin server to which this applies. 如果未指定此屬性設定，然後這會傳送至原始伺服器或伺服器上的所有頁面。If this propery is not specified, then this will be sent to all pages on the origin server or servers. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 可以套用的 TCP 連接埠清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of TCP ports that the applies to.

value.span: 可以套用的 TCP 連接埠清單。

span.span: The list of TCP ports that the applies to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會設定連接埠限制此可能會傳送。This attribute restricts the ports to which this may be sent. 預設值為沒有限制。The default value means no restriction. 將此設定為空字串 ("") 會限制 HTTP 回應中所使用的連接埠。Setting this to the empty string ("") will restrict the port to the one used in the HTTP response. 否則，值必須是雙引號括住的字串，包含以逗號分隔的連接埠值。Otherwise, the value must be a double-quoted string that contains port values delimited with commas. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. exception.span: 無法剖析為設定作業所指定的值，或是該值並未包含於雙引號中。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation could not be parsed or is not enclosed in double quotes.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實際上，當這個屬性是`true`這個 cookie 可能會傳送只能與 https:// 要求。In effect, when this property is `true` this cookie may be sent only with https:// requests. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. The for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的不得`null`。The of a must not be `null`. 如果`null`值指派給這個屬性，則會取代為空字串。If a `null` value is assigned to this property, it's replaced with an empty string. 以分號和逗號是保留的字元不能用於這個屬性的值。Semicolons and commas are reserved characters that cannot be used in the value of this property. 將無效的字元指派給這個屬性不會擲回的例外狀況;但當您嘗試加入這要執行個體與方法，作業將會失敗並擲回例外狀況。Assigning invalid characters to this property doesn't throw an exception; but when you try to add this to a instance with the method, the operation will fail and throw an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 依據的 HTTP 狀態維護版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the version of HTTP state maintenance to which the cookie conforms.

value.span: Cookie 依據的 HTTP 狀態維護版本。

span.span: The version of HTTP state maintenance to which the cookie conforms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為屬性為 0，而且符合原始 Netscape 規格。The default value for the property is 0, complying with the original Netscape specification. 如果值明確設定為 1，然後這必須符合 RFC 2109。If the value is explicitly set to 1, then this must conform to RFC 2109. 請注意，如果由接收組 Cookie2 HTTP 回應標頭，合規性設定為 RFC 2965 自動建立。Note that if a was created automatically by receiving a Set-Cookie2 HTTP response header, the conformance is set to RFC 2965. 嘗試設定屬性小於零的值將會擲回例外狀況。An attempt to set the property to a value less than zero will throw an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示在回應中傳回的 cookie 的屬性。The following example displays the properties of cookies returned in a response. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#3)]

exception.span: 不允許指定給版本的值。

span.span: The value specified for a version is not allowed.
